original_text: And there were vestibules all around, twenty-five cubits long and five cubits broad.
korean_text: 그 사방 현관의 길이는 스물다섯 척이요 너비는 다섯 척이며

sentences.original_text: And there were vestibules all around
twenty-five cubits long and five cubits broad.
sentences.korean_translation: 길이는 이십오 규빗이요 너비는 다섯 규빗이며
